00021 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/src/CHPFileVersion.h"
00022 //
00023 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CHPData.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/CHPFileReader.h"
00025 //
00026 #include "file/CHPFileData.h"
00027 //
00028 
00029 using namespace affxchp;
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00031 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00032 using namespace affymetrix_chp_converter;
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * Check if the input file is a Calvin file.
00036  */
00037 static bool IsCalvinCHPFile(const char *fileName)
00038 {
00039         CHPData data;
00040         CHPFileReader reader;
00041         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00042         try
00043         {
00044                 reader.Read(data);
00045                 data.Clear();
00046                 return true;
00047         }
00048         catch (affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException)
00049         {
00050         }
00051         catch (...)
00052         {
00053         }
00054         return false;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * Open the file as a Calvin file first then try as a GCOS file.
00060  */
00061 CHPFileVersionType CHPFileVersion::DetermineCHPFileVersion(const char *fileName)
00062 {
00063         if (IsCalvinCHPFile(fileName) == true)
00064         {
00065                 return Calvin_Version1;
00066         }
00067 
00068         CCHPFileData chp;
00069         chp.SetFileName(fileName);
00070         if (chp.IsMas5File() == true)
00071         {
00072                 return GCOS_Mas5_Version;
00073         }
00074         if (chp.IsXDACompatibleFile() == true)
00075         {
00076                 return GCOS_XDA_Version;
00077         }
00078 
00079         return Unknown_Version;
00080 }
